name: Rogan Josh Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Rogan Josh Recipe: Beef Â½ kg Garlic (finely chopped) 8-10 cloves Onion (finely chopped) 2 Yogurt 250 gm Green Cardamoms 3-4 Black Cardamoms Seeds 1 tbsp Red Pepper Paste 2 tbsp Bay Leaves 4-5 Cloves 3-4 Cinnamon 2-3 sticks Coriander Powder 1 tsp Fennels Seeds powder 1 tbsp Turmeric Powder 1 tbsp Stock 1 liter Oil or clarified Butter as required Salt to taste
instructions: Heat oil or ghee in a pan Add whole spices and fry Now add garlic and onion, fry well Add beef , cook till it changes color, add whipped yogurt and add all spices along, Cook for a while . Add stock and cook till meat is tender and gravy is thick. Dish out and serve
